# Blockquotes

## Simple Quote

> This is a simple blockquote.

Text after quote.

## Multi-Line Quote

> This is a longer quote
> that spans multiple lines
> and should be combined.

## Quote With Formatting

> This quote has **bold** and *italic* text.
> It also has `code` and a [link](https://example.com).

## Nested Quotes (Conceptual)

> First level quote
> > Second level nested
> Back to first

## Quote After List

- List item one
- List item two

> Quote after a list should work.

## Multiple Quotes

> First quote here.

Some text between.

> Second quote here.

## Quote With Special Chars

> Quote with "double quotes" and 'single quotes'.
> Also & ampersand and <angle brackets>.
